snippet: U.S. and Russian summaries of a telephone conversation between Presidents Obama and Putin seemed to be talking about two different calls.
abstract: Diplomatic Memo; United States and Russian summaries of telephone conversation between Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin and Pres Obama, to discuss escalating crisis in Ukraine, seem to be talking about two different calls; in its account, White House suggests that Obama delivered a finger-wagging lecture, while Putin’s office issues its own summary in which Russian leader sounds anything but chastened.
lead_paragraph: U.S. and Russian summaries of a telephone conversation between Presidents Obama and Putin seemed to be talking about two different calls.

headline.main: Between Obama and Putin, a Game of He Said, He Said
headline.print_headline: Between Obama and Putin, a Game of He Said, He Said
